title: [Large-Scale] Social Constructivist Blended Education Program for Strengthening Core Competencies in Palliative Care

context.prior_knowledge: 3+ Years of Medical/Nursing Practice Experience and Understanding of Basic Palliative Care Concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasizes problem-solving in real clinical scenarios through interdisciplinary collaboration among field practitioners.

learning_goals: Over 90% of learners achieve 80+ points on the Palliative Care Competency Framework within four weeks.
Ability to establish multidisciplinary collaborative treatment plans after analyzing real clinical cases in team-based projects.
Submission of three or more reflective journals incorporating peer feedback from online discussion forums.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
